metadata.title: CVE-2024-22243 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Applications that use UriComponentsBuilder to parse an externally providedURL (e.g. through a query parameter) AND perform validation checks on thehost of the parsed URL may be vulnerable to a open redirecthttps://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/601.html attack or to a SSRF attackif the URL is used after passing validation checks.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
